thread.title: steven in Valley Forge.
thread.title_full: Olive Oil Lovers reviewed by steven in Valley Forge.

author: steven in Valley Forge.
title: steven in Valley Forge.
text: I have been a customer of Olive Oil Lovers for several years and they have great service and great selection. A particular Tuscan oil is my favoorite having been introduced to it at a shop in Florence, and it a small production oil but available from Olive Oil Lovers.
